informalexample.para: To add a Watermark to a printed Form, double-click on the copy you want to add the Watermark to. The following screen will appear:
When adding a Watermark to a copy of a printed Form, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify the name of the Watermark to be used on the selected copy. Different copies can have different Watermarks.
Select to show Prices on the selected copy.
